alert.note: Alert for Ascension; Iberville (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 27 at 5:02AM CDT until April 27 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: The National Weather Service in New Orleans has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Ascension Parish in southeastern Louisiana... Southeastern Iberville Parish in southeastern Louisiana... * Until 545 AM CDT. * At 501 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bayou Sorrel, or 9 miles southwest of Plaquemine, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Plaquemine, St. Gabriel, White Castle, Sorrento, Prairieville, Geismar, Bayou Sorrel, Carville and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 171 and 189. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
